title.narrative: OUTP 7.3: INCLUSIVE SOCIAL PROTCTN SYST

description.narrative: Output 7.3: Enhanced capacity of disadvantaged and marginalized children and families to use social protection systems and participate in decision-making processes affecting them., which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Public Finance And Local Governance, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 7: Improved policy environment and systems for disadvantaged and excluded children, guided by improved knowledge and data.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 7.3: Enhanced capacity of disadvantaged and marginalized children and families to use social protection systems and participate in decision-making processes affecting them.

description.narrative: The Zimbabwe Social Protection Sector Review was successfully completed, with shift in focus to upstream advocacy work on sustainable financing from government resources. Key advocacy work with the Ministry of Finance and Ministry of Public Service, Labour and Social Welfare saw an increase in budget releases for social protection | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:24/02/2020
